004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.units.Units.Second;
008
009import edu.wpi.first.units.Measure;
010import edu.wpi.first.units.Time;
011import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
012import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
013import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Timer;
014
015/**
016 * A command that does nothing but takes a specified amount of time to finish.
017 *
018 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
019 */
020public class WaitCommand extends Command {
021  /** The timer used for waiting. */
022  protected Timer m_timer = new Timer();
023
024  private final double m_duration;
025
026  /**
027   * Creates a new WaitCommand. This command will do nothing, and end after the specified duration.
028   *
029   * @param seconds the time to wait, in seconds
030   */
031  @SuppressWarnings("this-escape")
032  public WaitCommand(double seconds) {
033    m_duration = seconds;
034    SendableRegistry.setName(this, getName() + ": " + seconds + " seconds");
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * Creates a new WaitCommand. This command will do nothing, and end after the specified duration.
039   *
040   * @param time the time to wait
041   */
042  public WaitCommand(Measure<Time> time) {
043    this(time.in(Second));
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public void initialize() {
048    m_timer.restart();
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
053    m_timer.stop();
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public boolean isFinished() {
058    return m_timer.hasElapsed(m_duration);
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
063    return true;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
068    super.initSendable(builder);
069    builder.addDoubleProperty("duration", () -> m_duration, null);
070  }
071}
